title: Cardano AI-dApp Incubator India: Create 10 dApps, 15k+ Txns
summary: Cardano’s AI tools are strong (SyncAI, Masumi, Flux Point), yet adoption is weak. Despite an easy learning curve, few devs are building AI DApps and Cardano is falling behind other major chains.
solution: Deliver a Cardano incubator in India with focused AI workshops to engage 100 new AI developers and support them in launching 10 full-scale mainnet dApps, driving 15K+ on-chain transactions in 6 months
proposer_relevant_experience:
**Adnan Khan**

[https://x\.com/skepticus\_x](https://x.com/skepticus_x)

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/adnan\-khan\-x/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/adnan-khan-x/)

Adnan has over four years of experience in the Web3 space, working as a product architect for multiple startups. He previously served as a research partner at Levitate Labs, a Web3-focused venture capital firm and accelerator. Adnan holds a degree in Data Science and Machine Learning and was a core contributor to user experience research at Fetcch, a Web3 research venture.



**SyncAI Network** - syncai.network 

We are a blockchain development company, with a team of 11+ developers specializing in web3 and AI solutions. Our team has collaborated with established projects, including Biconomy, 0g, Nillion network, NMKR, IAGON, IAMX and Nucast, contributing to the development of multiple projects across the ecosystem.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: We are targeting AI engineers, data scientists, and dApp developers across India who are eager to build real AI-powered applications on-chain. We will reach them through university partnerships, AI/ML communities, hackathon groups, and targeted outreach on LinkedIn, Discord, and X. By activating high-quality technical talent and onboarding them into Cardano’s AI ecosystem, we increase wallet creation, regional community participation, and long-term builder retention. More DApps being created will lead to increased on-chain tx activity. This directly supports Cardano’s grassroots growth and expands its presence in the rapidly emerging AI-blockchain space.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Host a series of virtual AI workshops teaching how to build AI-dApps using SyncAI, Masumi, and Flux Point Studios.





Operate a 6-month online incubator guiding selected developers through full dApp deployment.





Provide hands-on training, code templates, dApp architecture support, and on-chain integration assistance.





Run milestone-based challenges to accelerate development and increase retention.





Support developers through office hours, mentors, and community channels.





Promote completed dApps through demos, showcases, and integrations with Cardano community hubs.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
100 AI developers engaged into the workshops.

10+ mainnet AI-dApps successfully launched through the incubator.

15,000+ on-chain cardano transactions generated within six months.

New community groups formed around Indian AI/ML + Cardano.

Increase in Cardano-related knowledge, measured via pre/post workshop quizzes.

Growth of active communication channels, including Discord and mailing list sign-ups.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Our solution is to activate India’s rapidly growing AI developer ecosystem by delivering a structured program that combines virtual AI workshops, a hands-on AI-dApp incubator, and direct on-chain deployment support using Cardano AI tooling (SyncAI, Masumi, and Flux Point Studios). The goal is to make Cardano the preferred chain for AI developers by eliminating friction, offering mentorship, and guiding developers all the way to mainnet deployment.

![](https://ik.imagekit.io/rt68ucjjc/Sync/cardano%20ati-min.png)

We address the problem by providing a smooth, end-to-end pathway from awareness to training to incubation to real on-chain impact. Cardano already has powerful AI tools, but the missing piece is an activation engine that brings skilled developers into the ecosystem and helps them build meaningful AI-dApps quickly. Our program delivers exactly that.

# What We Will Do
**1\. Virtual AI Workshops**

Run a series of virtual AI workshops targeted at India’s top AI/ML talent, introducing them to SyncAI, Masumi, and Flux Point Studios tooling.

**2\. 6\-Month AI\-dApp Incubator**

Create a 6-month AI-dApp incubator, offering structured mentorship, technical support, architectural guidance, and deployment help.

**3\. Developer Acceleration Tools**

Provide starter templates, integration examples, evaluation prompts, and on-chain workflows to accelerate development.

**4\. Ongoing Engagement**

Host monthly progress checkpoints, demo days, and community sessions to maintain retention and momentum.

**5\. Mainnet Deployments**

Guide selected teams to deploy 10+ AI-powered mainnet dApps and generate 15,000+ on-chain transactions.

**6\. Ecosystem Promotion**

Promote completed projects within Cardano channels, events, and technical communities to further amplify ecosystem growth.

This structured pipeline ensures developers don’t just learn, they actually build, deploy, and contribute to real on-chain activity.

# Why India
India is emerging as a global Web3 + AI superpower:

- 5M+ IT professionals
- Strong AI/ML pipelines from IITs, NITs
- Rapidly growing Web3 & DAO ecosystem
- High engagement in large-scale developer programs
- Hackathons like IndiaCodeX Track Record
- 2,000+ students reached
- 800+ developers across 5 cities
- 3,400+ participants in 2025
- SyncAI active in IndiaCodeX + Cardano Summit workshops

Cardano has momentum here, this program amplifies it.

# **Flow \(Step\-by\-Step\)**
1. Awareness: IndiaCodeX network, regional DAOs, colleges, AI/ML groups, X/LinkedIn/Telegram/Discord.
2. Virtual Workshops: Hands-on training using SyncAI, Masumi, Flux tooling
3. Initial Screening: Interested Participants present their ideas in a virtual event
4. Selection: Top performers selected for incubator.
5. Incubator (6 Months): Mentorship, code reviews, templates, on-chain workflows, Catalyst coaching, cloud/API credits.
6. Build & Deploy: Teams deploy 10+ AI-dApps and generate 15k+ transactions.
7. Showcase & Scale: Demo day, Cardano ecosystem promotion, hiring & funding opportunities.

# **Marketing Funnels**
**Top of Funnel – Awareness**

**How we attract developers:**

- IndiaCodeX community
- Regional DAOs (Web3 Madras, Pune DAO, Hyderabad DAO, Punjab, Jaipur, Kerala, Gujarat, Bengal, North-East)
- Universities & tech clubs
- AI/ML groups
- Social channels (X, LinkedIn, Telegram, Discord)

**Mid Funnel – Engagement**

How we keep them active:

- Virtual AI workshops
- Coding challenges & micro-bounties
- Cloud/API credits
- Practical assignments & templates

**Bottom Funnel – Conversion**

**How we turn them into builders:**

- Incubator selection
- Catalyst coaching
- Mentorship & development support
- Mainnet deployments
- Milestone-based ADA rewards

# **Incentives**
**Skill & Career Growth**

1. Catalyst proposal coaching
2. Portfolio building & GitHub mentorship
3. Hiring connections with Cardano ecosystem teams

**Build\-to\-Earn Structure**

1. Rewards for completing workshop tasks
2. Milestone incentives during incubator
3. ADA bonuses for prototypes, demos, and deployment

**Distributed for:**

1. Workshop completion
2. Prototype milestones
3. Mainnet deployment
4. Usage milestones (5k–10k–15k txns)
5. Exceptional team performance

This drives full engagement from

learning → building → deploying → scaling

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
This project activates India’s fast-growing AI developer ecosystem and channels it directly into Cardano. By guiding developers from learning to building to mainnet deployment, we create measurable on-chain impact and long-term ecosystem growth. Our structured pipeline will engage 100+ AI developers over six months, incubate high-quality AI-dApps, and deliver at least 10 mainnet deployments generating 15,000+ transactions.

The impact will be measured through developer participation, incubator retention, prototypes built, mainnet launches, and on-chain usage. All outputs including dApps, templates, open-source code, workshops, and community demos will be shared with the Cardano community to enable reuse, learning, and ecosystem-wide scaling.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Our team has a proven track record of delivering high-impact developer programs at scale through SyncAI, contributions to IndiaCodeX, and India Cardano Summit. Over the past two years, we have consistently demonstrated the ability to attract, train, and retain large developer communities across India.



**Our Team’s Capabilities**

SyncAI have been directly involved in:

1. Contributing to IndiaCodeX events and operations
2. Designing and delivering technical workshops
3. Supporting Cardano Summit local activities
4. Building and maintaining grassroots developer communities
5. Helping onboard new builders into Cardano AI tooling



These experiences give us both the operational capacity and the community trust required to run large-scale programs responsibly.



**Why Our Approach Is Feasible**

- We already have established funnels and active communities (IndiaCodeX + regional DAOs).
- We have experience running workshops, tracking progress, and managing multi-city operations.
- We understand how to convert workshop interest into real on-chain activity.
- Our proposed flow (awareness → workshops → incubator → deployment) is the same model we’ve executed successfully before now focused on AI-dApps.
- Milestones, reporting, and transparent tracking ensure funds are used properly and outcomes remain measurable.

With a proven history of execution, strong community infrastructure, and a scalable operational model, we are fully capable of delivering this project with high reliability, accountability, and impact.

sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
A large awareness campaign will be launched across IndiaCodeX, regional DAOs, and top universities to attract India’s AI and Web2 developer community. 



The landing page, onboarding funnel, and communication channels will go live, enabling the first wave of participants to register smoothly. 



Our goal is to generate broad visibility and convert this reach into a strong talent pool for the upcoming workshops.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: All outreach links must be publicly visible across partner channels, and the onboarding system must gather at least 100 verified developer signups. This confirms that the recruitment funnel is functioning and that developers are entering the ecosystem as expected.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Screenshots of campaigns, DAO announcements, and university outreach will be provided, along with an export of the signup dashboard and written confirmations from marketing partners.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
The total requested budget is 60,000 ADA, distributed across key operational phases to ensure training, incubation, deployment, and measurable on-chain impact.

**15,000 ADA — Awareness & Funnel Activation**



Outreach Campaigns — 4,000 ADA



Onboarding Funnel Setup — 2,500 ADA



University & DAO Partnerships — 3,000 ADA



Communications & Media — 2,500 ADA



Growth & Awareness Grants — 3,000 ADA



**10,000 ADA — Virtual AI Workshops**



Instructor Hours — 3,000 ADA



Curriculum Creation — 2,000 ADA



Event Hosting Tools — 1,500 ADA



Developer Support — 2,000 ADA



Recording & Editing — 1,500 ADA



**13,000 ADA — Incubator Selection & Development**



Application Review — 3,000 ADA



Mentorship Sessions — 3,500 ADA



Dev Infrastructure — 2,500 ADA



Cloud/API Credits — 2,000 ADA



Demo Day Production — 2,000 ADA



**10,000 ADA — Mainnet Deployments**



Deployment Support — 3,000 ADA



Testing & QA — 2,000 ADA



Security Review — 2,000 ADA



DevOps Hours — 1,500 ADA



Launch Showcase — 1,500 ADA



**6,000 ADA — Growth Phase \(15k\+ Txn Target\)**



Scaling Support — 2,000 ADA



Promotional Campaigns — 1,500 ADA



Community Activations — 1,000 ADA



Usage Tracking — 1,500 ADA



6,000 ADA — Final Reporting & Closure Video



Final Report — 2,000 ADA



Open-Source Releases — 1,500 ADA



KPI Dashboard — 1,000 ADA



Closure Video — 1,500 ADA



Total: 60,000 ADA

This budget ensures end-to-end execution from developer onboarding to real on-chain deployment.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
This project delivers strong value for the Cardano ecosystem by converting India’s large AI talent pool into active on-chain builders. For a cost of 50,000 ADA, Cardano receives:

High Output for Low Cost

- 100+ AI developers engaged
- 25–30 incubated builders
- 10+ mainnet AI-dApps deployed
- 15,000+ on-chain transactions
- Reusable templates, workflows, open-source assets
- A scalable funnel for future Catalyst cohorts

Efficient Spend

Every ADA directly supports developer activation: training, mentorship, infrastructure, and deployment support not overhead or administrative bloat.

Long-Term Ecosystem Value

- Establishes India as a sustained Cardano AI hub
- Creates real AI-dApps with monetization pathways
- Builds future Catalyst proposers through coaching
- Strengthens grassroots DAOs and regional communities
- Generates reusable educational assets for all builders

High Impact / Low Cost Ratio

For 60,000 ADA, the ecosystem gains permanent tooling, open-source resources, new developers, and real on-chain activity.

The cost per engaged developer, cost per dApp, and cost per transaction are significantly lower than industry-standard activation programs.
